channel.title: Sinks on Bruco üêõ
channel.description: Recent content in Sinks on Bruco üêõ

item.title: Kafka
item.description: The kafka sink is activated using the kafka kind Example: # OPTIONAL: you can have a source and a processor without a sink sink: kind: kafka brokers: - localhost:9092 topic: test-out # OPTIONAL: target partition partition: 42 # OPTIONAL: default hash if partition is not defined. values: manual, hash, random partitioner: hash

item.title: NATS
item.description: The nats sink is activated using the nats kind Example: # OPTIONAL: you can have a source and a processor without a sink sink: kind: nats serverUrl: localhost:4222 subject: out.sub
